summary: Non-replacing dark hide armor for female characters
descriptionHtml:
BLACK HIDE ARMOR v1.20

Non-replacing dark hide armor for female characters, based on the popular forsworn armor. Contains armor, gloves and boots. No feathers, no pendant, no bag. This minimal design allows for maximum agility.

================================================================

FAQ

What does non-replacing mean?
- No items will be replaced by installing this mod. A new, unique set of armor will be added to the game.

How do I get it?
- Once installed, the merchant Grelka in Riften market will sell the armor to you for a reasonable price.

================================================================

Changelog:

Version 1.20
- Now fully upgradable at a workbench

Version 1.11
- Minor adjustments to directory settings

Version 1.10
- Now non-replacing. The armor can be bought from Grelka in Riften 
- Correction of some minor visual flaws

================================================================

Installation instructions:

1) Copy the \"Data\" folder into your Skyrim folder, which is most likely
C:\\program files (x86)\\steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\

*note: for 32bit Windows users it might be
C:\\program files\\steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\

2) Start Skyrim. In the launcher, click on \"data files\" and make sure \"BlackHideArmor.esp\" is checked.

3) Play the game, enjoy :)

----------------------------------------------------------------
To uninstall, you need to delete the following files: 

- BlackHideArmor.esp from the skyrim/Data directory.
- Both \"blackhide\" named folders in the /meshes as well as in the /textures directories of your skyrim/Data folder.

================================================================

THANK YOU FOR DOWNLOADING
author: Ceekay9

files.name: Black Hide Armor
